---
title: "🗓️ Week 13 - Immanuel Kant-Critique of the Power of Judgment"
---

Which faculty is responsible for our aesthetic judgments? Consider two kinds of object. We find tables in restaurants, but we also find tables in art museums. There are also two different kinds of judgments that we use to evaluate the two tables. One table is beautiful but the other is functional. What faculties do we use to decide whether something is beautiful, and which do we use to decide something is functional?
